title: Brand Design Manager
content:
Role: Brand Design Manager
Reporting into: Head of Growth
Location: Remote (with option to work from our NYC HQ if applicable) 
Salary: $95k - $110k
Do you absolutely love content and storytelling? Do you want to work at an organization that values creativity, risk-taking, and the ability to create bizarre memes about SEO? Are you excited by the prospect of working for a mission-driven organization that helps freelance creatives get paid well to do what they love? Then we just might have the job for you.
Over the past decade, Contently has pioneered the content marketing space and attracted an audience of hundreds of thousands of people across the globe. We’re a SaaS company, but we’re also deeply passionate about helping freelance creatives and educating the business world on how they can use stories to build deep relationships with their customers.
The Contently Brand Design Manager owns the design needs stemming from our marketing, customer success, product, creative marketplace and sales teams. This role is also essential in the definition, creation and expression of the Contently brand aesthetic and how that look and feel gets applied to all aspects of both internal and external materials.
There is no limit to the influence of the Contently brand across the organization. Applications include both digital and print work: corporate website, landing pages, advertisements, and social graphics; presentations, collateral, playbooks, event graphics such as signage, company swag, video content development and photo shoots.
Additionally, the role includes helping to strategize and produce marrying designs to key content stories that materialize through our blog and marketing messages. This sometimes includes hiring and working closely with outside illustrators to bring certain concepts to life such as our playbook series. All of the company’s materials effectively convey the Contently brand to internal employees, in recruitment efforts, as well as prospective and existing clients.
The BDM works closely with the Head of Growth to develop these materials in agile fashion and therefore can quickly distill multifaceted processes and multi-level value statements into concise materials that will resonate with the desired audience. Since the role has an outsized influence on the overall design direction for Contently and its products, you are self-motivated go getter! 
What’s required is a sharp eye for detail and highly developed organizational skills, including the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
What You’ll Do

Update website aesthetic as and when brand guideline evolves 
Create design for all paid and organic social posts (posts, videos, animations, graphics, etc) 
Work closely with the CEO on the design for all board decks and company all-hands 
Collaborate with marketing team to help execute projects (webinars, email campaigns, social campaigns, etc) 
Collaborate with our SR Brand Strategy Manager to update and create new sales enablement assets (presentations, one-sheeters, videos, etc) 
Ensure all employees are using correct assets, fonts, style guides, etc. for brand consistency 
Educate company as/when new assets are completed and available for use 
Helping design and refine various brand communications and presentations.
Contributing to, and evolving, brand guidelines
Creating data visualizations
Workshopping logo and identity concepts for new products
Designing conference materials like banners, back-lit displays, podiums, etc
Update presentations, the company website, and all needed product & revenue-needed assets
Thinking about novel ways to apply the brand universally
Organize and keep all assets up to date and easily accessible 
Act as a team player

Who You Are

A team player - you want to be apart of a work culture that prides itself on candor, accountability, curiosity and empathy 
At least 5 years’ experience in creating client-facing content in a tech industry.
A strong portfolio demonstrating experience in the above areas.
Strong proficiency in the Adobe Creative Suite (Indesign, Photoshop and Illustrator).
High expertise in Powerpoint, Keynote, and Canva
Ability to translate concepts into strong visual campaigns from an execution standpoint.
Experience receiving and applying input from a diverse team of stakeholders from both technical and non technical backgrounds.
Very well organized and able to multitask in a fast-paced environment.
A strong design aesthetic that sweats the details. Strong storytelling abilities in a variety of mediums (print, powerpoint, video).
Fluent in digital, print, and video production.

What We Value

High-performing creative leaders who have a solution mindset and dig into problems and opportunities with fervor and enthusiasm
Leaders who actively participate at all levels of building the business, not afraid to advocate for recommended solutions and promote
Humility and accountability; focused on the right solution, collaboration, and empowering their employees
We heavily emphasize an environment of teaching and learning to equip employees with the tools needed to be successful in their function and the company
Async and fluid work environment through family friendly policies, remote benefits and flexible time off
We strongly believe in the value of growing a diverse team and encourage people of all backgrounds, genders, ethnicities, abilities, and sexual orientations to apply

About the Company
Contently is a leader in the content marketing space as the industry’s only end to end solution for the problems facing today’s marketers. We are a software company whose full stack platform has hundreds of applications. This includes our data-driven content strategy and network of 160,000 award-winning content creators, which empowers you to build meaningful relationships with your customers.
Working at Contently means that you will be collaborating with extremely intelligent, creative, and diverse problem-solvers who love a good story and many laughs. Contently employees receive the best perks out there – great benefits including equity, 401k plan to Friday lunches and a flexible time off.
Contently is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, genetic information, national origin, ancestry, medical condition, disability, marital status, caregiver status, pregnancy, citizenship, age, military or veteran status, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
